Room.Name: Circular Room
Room.ShortDescription: This room is completely circular in shape, with a door to the southeast.
Room.LongDescription: You're led to wonder what a room like this is doing in the sewer. After considering it for several minutes, you finally come to the conclusion that it must have been used by some religous cult. Mystical markings and animals skulls sit atop obsidian black tables all throughout the room. Tablets with strange letters marked upon them stand shakily against the northern wall.
